title: Tom Watson As Captain: How Things Have Changed
headline: Tom Watson As Captain: How Things Have Changed
description: Tom Watson is the Ryder Cup captain of Team USA for a second time this year, more than 20 years after he first held the reigns in 1993. Here's a flashback to that year that will surely make you feel old.
short_headline: Tom Watson As Captain: How Things Have Changed
page_title: Tom Watson As Captain: How Things Have Changed
slug: Tom Watson As Captain: How Things Have Changed
body: Tom Watson is the Ryder Cup captain of Team USA for a second time this year, more than 20 years after he first held the reigns in 1993. Here's a flashback to that year that will surely make you feel old.
